response.explain: The error occurred because the fridge object was not registered before being used in the action function. The object should be registered first before being useable in the function.
response.subtask:
(1) Register all the objects
( 2) Move the robot to the fridge
(3) Open the fridge as per the originallubtask.
response.code:
def act(robott,env,camera):
